projects.mainTitle: Norwood Reservoir No. 2 – Norwood Water Commission
mainContent: WestWater Engineering completed the design of Norwood Reservoir No. 2 for the Norwood Water Commission.  The Norwood Reservoir is a on-jurisdictional dam and is an off-stream reservoir that is 1,120-feet in length with a crest height of approximately 10-feet.

The dam impounds 95 acre-feet (AF) of water that is utilized for domestic purposes by the Town of Norwood and surrounding areas.  WestWater Engineering successfully completed the design working closely with the Division of Water Resources and th State Engineers Office.
